original: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya namaḥ dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya

original: om vipulagarbha vipulavimale vimalagarbhe vimale jayagarbhe vajrajvālāgarbhe gatigahane gaganaviśodhani sarvapāpaviśodhani /
analyzed: om vipulagarbha vipulavimale vimalagarbhe vimale jayagarbhe vajrajvālāgarbhe gati gahane gagana viśodhani sarva pāpa viśodhani

analyzed: jaya vijaye jayavati aparājite sarva bhaya vigate sarva garbha saṃrakṣaṇi siri siri bhiri bhiri

analyzed: sarva sattvān ca sarvadā bhayebhyaḥ sarva upadravebhyaḥ sarva vyādhibhyaḥ cilicili viriviri

analyzed: muci muci muri muri muli muli kili kili mili mili kamale vimale vimale jayavijaya āvahe jayavati viśeṣavati bhagavati ratna makuṭa mālā dhari bahu vividha vicitra veśa dhāriṇi

original: bhagavati mahāvidyā devi rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca samantātsarvapāpaviśodhani /
analyzed: bhagavati mahāvidyā devi rakṣa rakṣa mām sarva sattvān ca samantāt sarva pāpa viśodhani
hulu hulu mulu mulu rakṣa rakṣa mām
rayanān aśaraṇān aparāyaṇān parimocaya sarva duḥkhebhyaḥ
caṇḍi caṇḍi caṇḍini caṇḍini vegavati sarva duṣṭa nivāriṇi vijaya vāhini
huru huru curu curu turu turu āyuḥ pālali
sura vara pramathani sarva deva gaṇa pūjite

original: ciri-ciri viri-viri samantāvalokite prabhe-prabhe suprabhe suprabhaviśuddhe sarvapāpaviśuddhe
analyzed: ciriciri viriviri samanta avalokite prabheprabhe suprabhe suprabha viśuddhe sarva pāpa viśuddhe

original: sarvapāpaviśodhani dhuru-dhuru dharaṇidhare dhara-dhara sumuja sumuru-sumuru ru ru

māttaṅgini śrī vapu dhare jaya kamale kṣiṇi kṣiṇi vara da aṅkuśe

original: om padmaviśuddhe śodhaya-śodhaya śuddhe-śuddhe bhara-bhara bhiri-bhiri bhuru-bhuru maṅgalaviśuddhe /
analyzed: om padma viśuddhe śodhaya śodhaya śuddhe śuddhe bhara bhara bhiri bhiri bhuru bhuru maṅgala viśuddhe
pavitra mukhi khaḍgini khaḍgini khara khara jvalita śikhare jvalita śikhare samanta avalokita prabhe

original: suprabhaviśuddhe samaṃtāt prasāritāvabhāsitaviśuddhe jvala-jvala sarvadevagaṇasamākarṣaṇi satyavrate /
analyzed: su prabhā viśuddhe samaṃtāt prasārita avabhāsita viśuddhe jvala jvala sarva deva gaṇa samākarṣaṇi satya vrate

original: om hrīṃṃ traṃ tara-tara tāraya māṃ bhagavati sarvasattvāṃśca nāgavilokite laghu-laghu
analyzed: om hrīṃṃ traṃ taratara tāraya mām bhagavati sarva sattvān ca nāga vilokite laghu laghu

original: lahu-lahu hulu-hulu hutu-hutu turu-turu tuhu-tuhu kiṇi-kiṇi kṣiṇi-kṣiṇi sarvagrahabhakṣaṇi
analyzed: lahu lahu hu luhulu hutuhutu turu turu tuhu kiṇi kiṇi kṣiṇi kṣiṇi sarva graha bhakṣaṇi

original: piṃgari-piṃgari mucu-4 sumu-sumu suvicale tara-tara nāgavilokini tāraya māṃ bhagavati
analyzed: piṃgari piṃgari mucu su musumu su vicale taratara nāga vilokini tāraya mām bhagavati
sarva sattvān ca saṃsāra arṇavāt bhagavati aṣṭa mahā dāruṇa bhayebhyaḥ

original: sarvatra samantena diśābandhena vajrapāśabandhane vajrajvālini vajrajvālāviśuddhe /
analyzed: sarvatra samantena diśābandhena vajra pāśa bandhane vajra jvālini vajra jvālā viśuddhe

original: bhuri-bhuri bhara-bhara bhiri-bhiri bhuru-bhuru bhagavati garbhaviśuddhe garvasaṃśodhani kukṣisaṃpūraṇi rakṣa-rakṣaṇi /
analyzed: bhuri bhuri bhara bhara bhiri bhiri bhuru bhuru bhagavati garbha viśuddhe garva saṃśodhani kukṣi saṃpūraṇi rakṣa rakṣaṇi
devaḥ samantena divya udakena amṛta varṣaṇi devatā avatāriṇi
abhiṣiñcatu mām sugata vara vacana amṛta vapuṣe

original: rakṣa-rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca sarvatra sarvadāsarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopasargebhyaḥ
analyzed: rakṣa rakṣa mām sarva sattvān ca sarvatra sarvadā sarva bhayebhyaḥ sarva upasargebhyaḥ
sarva duṣṭa bhaya bhītebhyaḥ sarva kali kalaha vivāda sarva bhaya viśodhani duḥsvapna durnimitta amaṅgala pāpa viśodhani

original: kukṣisaṃpūraṇi sarvayakṣarākṣasanāgavidāriṇi bala-bala balavati jaya-jaya vijaya-vijaya
analyzed: kukṣi saṃpūraṇi sarva yakṣa rākṣasa nāga vidāriṇi bala bala balavati jaya jaya vijaya vijaya

original: ghāṭaya vidhnān jaya-jaya sidhya-sidhya budhya-budhya pūraya-pūraya pūraṇi-pūraṇi
analyzed: ghāṭaya vidhnān jaya jaya sidhya sidhya budhya budhya pūraya pūraya pūraṇi pūraṇi

original: pūraya me āśāṃ vidhodgatamūrte jayottari jayakari jayavati tiṣṭha-tiṣṭha bhagavati samayamanupālaya
analyzed: pūraya me āśām vidha udgata mūrte jaya uttari jaya kari jayavati tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bhagavati samayam anupālaya

original: sarvatathāgatahṛdayaviśuddhe vyavalokaya māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca sarvāśāṃ paripūraya
analyzed: sarva tathāgata hṛdaya viśuddhe vyavalokaya mām sarva sattvān ca sarva āśām paripūraya

original: sarvasattvānāñca trāyasva māmaṣṭamahādāruṇabhayebhyaḥ sara-sara prasara-prasara sarvāvaraṇaviśodhani
analyzed: sarva sattvānām ca trāyasva mām aṣṭa mahā dāruṇa bhayebhyaḥ sarasara prasara prasara sarva āvaraṇa viśodhani

original: samantākāra - viśuddhe vigate-vigate vigatamale sarvamalaviśodhani sarvamaṅgalaviśuddhe /
analyzed: viśuddhe vigate vigate vigata male sarva mala viśodhani sarva maṅgala viśuddhe
sarva tathāgata hṛdaya adhiṣṭhite hṛdaya svāhā
vajradhara vajrapāṇi bala vīrya adhiṣṭhite svāhā
om hana hana sarva śatrūn svāhā
om daha daha sarva duṣṭān svāhā
om paca paca pratyarthikān pratyamitrān svāhā

original: ye mamāhitaiṣiṇasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śarīraṃjvālaya-jvālaya sarvaduṣṭacittānāṃ svāhā /
analyzed: ye mama ahita eṣiṇaḥ teṣām sarveṣām śarīram jvālaya jvālaya sarva duṣṭa cittānām svāhā

original: sarvatathāgatamūrte pravaravigate vigatabhayasva me bhagavati sarvapāpasvastirbhavatu mama sarvasattvānāñca svāhā /
analyzed: sarva tathāgata mūrte pravara vigate vigata bhaya sva me bhagavati sarva pāpa svastiḥ bhavatu mama sarva sattvānām ca svāhā

original: om muni-muni vimuni-vimuni dhari-dhari cari-cari valane bhagavati bhayaharaṇi-bhayaharaṇi bodhi-bodhi bodhaya-bodhaya budhiri-budhiri cuṃbili-cuṃbili  #
analyzed: om muni muni vimuni vimuni dharidhari caricari valane bhagavati bhaya haraṇi bhaya haraṇi bodhi bodhi bodhaya bodhaya budhiri budhiri cuṃbili cuṃbili

original: om muni-muni munivare abhiṣiñca māṃ saparivāraṃ sarvasattvānāñca sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvavidyābhiṣekairmahākavacamudrāmudritaiḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdayādhiṣṭhitaśuddhe  #
analyzed: om muni muni muni vare abhiṣiñca mām sa parivāram sarva sattvānām ca sarva tathāgatāḥ sarva vidyā abhiṣekaiḥ mahā kavaca mudrā mudritaiḥ sarva tathāgata hṛdaya dhiṣṭhita śuddhe
punar evam apara mantrāḥ siddhāḥ sarva karma karāḥ śubhāḥ
sarva kāmaṃdadā bhadra āsyam prabhāṣe śṛṇuṣva ca

original: tadyathā om amṛtavare vara-vara pravara viśuddhe hūṃ-hūṃ phaṭ-phaṭ svāhā /
analyzed: tat yathā om amṛta vare vara vara pravara viśuddhe hūṃ hūm phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: om amṛtavilokini garbha saṃrakṣaṇi ākarṣaṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭ svāhā /
analyzed: om amṛtavilokini garbha saṃrakṣaṇi ākarṣaṇi hūm hūm phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: om vimale vipule jayavare jayavāhini amṛtaviraje hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭ svāhā /
analyzed: om vimale vipule jayavare jayavāhini amṛtaviraje hūm hūm phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: om bhara-bhara saṃbhara-saṃbhara indriye balaviśodhani hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭru ru cale svāhā /
analyzed: om bhara bhara saṃbhara saṃbhara indriye bala viśodhane hūm   phaṭ phaṭ ru ru cale svāhā

original: om maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭ svāhā /
analyzed: om maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare hūm hūm phaṭ phaṭ svāhā
asyāḥ śravaṇa mātreṇa sarva pāpa kṣayaṃgatā

original: yayā yukto vajrakāyo namastasyai namo namaḥ //
analyzed: yayā yuktaḥ vajra kāyaḥ namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yān smaran rāhulaḥ rakṣa mātaram kukṣi saṃsthitaḥ

original: prakṣipte yo viṣanadyāṃ namastasyai namo namaḥ //
analyzed: prakṣipte yaḥ viṣa nadyām namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yaḥ rakṣet vaṇijaḥ putram krūra sarpa vadha udyatam
viṣa dā aham u ṣaḥ ca namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
brahmadattaḥ mahā rājaḥ yayā rakṣitam aṣṭakaḥ
ripum jitvā virājaḥ bhūt namaḥ tasyai manaḥ sadā
bhikṣu duḥśīlakaḥ rogī yayā kaṇṭhe prabandhitaḥ

original: prāṇāmukto yayai svargaṃ namastasyai namo namaḥ //
analyzed: prāṇa āmuktaḥ yayai svargam namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
samudre pota saṃkṣubdhe vaṇijān prāṇa rakṣakaḥ
yām smaran sārthavāhaḥ bhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
prasārita bhujaḥ rājā namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
rājā ajiṣṭa pradātā abhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yām prabuddha asuraiḥ baddhaḥ cūḍāmaṇau prabhuḥ
labdhavān vijayam vajrī namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: mārāñjitvā jinā buddhā namastasyai namo namaḥ //
analyzed: mārān jitvā jināḥ buddhāḥ namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
aparādhī vadha arhaḥ api prakṣiptaḥ sarva saṃkaṭe
yām smṛtaḥ parimuktaḥ abhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yayā bandhita kaṇṭhaḥ ca mukta upāya saṃkaṭāt
nagare nāyakaḥ bhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
mudritā bhāṣitā nityam paṭhitā para deśitā
likhitā moditā sattva hitāya pūjitā sadā

original: smṛtvā kāyagatāṃ kṛtvā namastasyai namo namaḥ //
analyzed: smṛtvā kāya gatām kṛtvā namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
pāṭha svādhyayanam vā api namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yā vidyā durlabhā buddhaiḥ vyākṛtā saṃpraśaṃsitā
mahatī dhāraṇī khyātā sarva pāpa kṣayaṃkarī
rakṣiṇī poṣiṇī dhātrī para mantra vighāṭinī
mahāyāna ratānām ca gṛhṇatām likhatām tathā
pāṭha adhyayana kṛtām nityam dadhatām śrūyatām tathā

original: parebhyo diśatāṃ caiva nityaṃ manasi bhāvitām /
analyzed: parebhyaḥ diśatām ca eva nityam manasi bhāvitām
sa pustaka gatām kṛtvā pūjya mānya namaskṛtam
sarva pāpa harī bhadrā bodhi saṃbhāra pūraṇī
namaḥ tasyai namaḥ tasyai namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yasyāḥ mantra prabhāveṇa sarva bhaye upadravāḥ
duṣṭa asura manuṣyāḥ ca daitya gandharva rākṣasāḥ
grahāḥ skaṃdāḥ apasmārāḥ piśācāḥ yakṣa kinnarāḥ

original: ḍākinyaḥ śākinīsaṃghā nāgāḥ kāṣordda tu vyādhayaḥ /
analyzed: ḍākinyaḥ śākinī saṃghāḥ nāgāḥ tu vyādhayaḥ
jvarāḥ ca vividhāḥ rogāḥ para karma kṛtāḥ tathā
viṣa agni śastra mantrāṇi vidyutaḥ kāla bādhayaḥ
ati vṛṣṭiḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ sarva śatru bhayāni ca
tathā anye pi upasargāḥ vā vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
sarva kāryāṇi namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: yaśca tāṃ dhārayet vidyāṃ kaṇṭhe vāhau ca mastake /
analyzed: yaḥ ca tām dhārayet vidyām kaṇṭhe vāhau ca mastake
nityam rakṣanti devāḥ tam daityāḥ nāgāḥ ca mānuṣāḥ
gandharvāḥ kinnarāḥ yakṣāḥ bhūta preta piśācakāḥ

original: trisandhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhet nityaṃ buddhārakṣanti taṃ sadā /
analyzed: trisandhyam yaḥ paṭhet nityam buddhāḥ ārakṣanti tam sadā
pratyekāḥ śrāvakāḥ ca eva bodhisattvāḥ maharddhikāḥ
yoginaḥ siddha mantrāḥ ca mahā vīrya mahā ṛṣayaḥ
vajrapāṇiḥ ca yakṣa indraḥ śakraḥ ca tridaśaiḥ saha
catvāraḥ ca mahā rājāḥ brahmā viṣṇuḥ maheśvara
bhairavāḥ mātṛkāḥ durgāḥ tathā anye māra kāyikāḥ
vidyā devyaḥ mahā vīryāḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ
tathā dhanyā mahābhāgā padma kuṇḍaliḥ eva ca
hārī iti pāñcikā ca eva śaṃkhinī kūṭa dantinī

original: tamevānye 'pi rakṣanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā /
analyzed: tam eva anye rakṣanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā
sa bhavet sarva sattvānām mokṣaṇa artham samudyataḥ
rājānaḥ vaśa gāḥ tasya puṇya rāśim vivardhayet
siddhayante sarva kalpāḥ ca praviṣṭaḥ jina mandire
ante bauddha padam yāyāt jinasya vacanam yathā

original: yā strī dhārayed vidyāṃ prasūyedgurviṇī sukham //
analyzed: yā strī dhārayet vidyām prasūyet gurviṇī sukham
aputrā labhate putram vyādhi muktā sukha āśinī
dhana dhānyaiḥ varaiḥ yuktā mānanīyā priyaṃvadā

original: ityavocad bhagavān sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadabhyanandan // iti //
analyzed: iti avocat bhagavān sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad abhyanandan iti
